description: This table contains more basic information from infection abstractions.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: DAILY_MIN_MAP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient's daily minimum MAP value meets VAE criteria. 'Y' indicates that the patient's minimum MAP value has been documented as meeting VAE criteria. 'N' indicates that it has been documented as not meeting the criteria. NULL indicates that this information has not been documented.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PEDVAE_CLIN_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether there were clinical events associated with the pediatric VAE event. Note that the shared category list for this column is stored in ZC_DNR_HTENSION.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Unknown

columns.name: PEDVAE_OTHER_EVENT
columns.description: Free-text description of which "other" clinical event is associated with the pediatric VAE event.

columns.name: NHSN_ABX_1_INTERNAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the concept record that identifies the first antimicrobial agent given to the patient for the infection case.

columns.name: NHSN_ABX_1_DATE
columns.description: The date for the start of the first antimicrobial agent for the infection case.

columns.name: NHSN_ABX_2_INTERNAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the concept record that identifies the second antimicrobial agent given to the patient for the infection case.

columns.name: NHSN_ABX_2_DATE
columns.description: The date for the start of the second antimicrobial agent for the infection case.

columns.name: NHSN_ABX_3_INTERNAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the concept record that identifies the third antimicrobial agent given to the patient for the infection case.

columns.name: NHSN_ABX_3_DATE
columns.description: The date for the start of the third antimicrobial agent for the infection case.

columns.name: PATH_IDENTIFIED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a pathogen was identified for the infection case. 'Y' indicates that a pathogen was identified. 'N' indicates that a pathogen was not identified. NULL indicates that this information was not documented for the infection case.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DAILY_MIN_MAP_YN

columns.name: BLOOD_PATHOGEN_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a pathogen was identified from a blood specimen for the infection case. 'Y' indicates that a blood pathogen was identified. 'N' indicates that a blood pathogen was not identified. NULL indicates that this information was not documented for the infection case.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DAILY_MIN_MAP_YN
